backend/main.mo: Defines the main challenge canister with authorization, storage, user profiles, challenges, recordings with sharing flags, chat messages, and assignment metadata.
backend/migration.mo: Transforms old challenge data into the new format by wrapping recordings with an isShared flag while preserving all other state fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature requirements, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for recording sharing, team tab filtering, and deletion behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for numerous frontend files including screens, components, hooks, styling, and i18n resources.
frontend/index.css: Delegates to the main stylesheet by importing src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell setting cache‑busting headers, build version meta, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app logic handling authentication flow, URL‑synced navigation, update detection, challenge deletion notice, and screen routing.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered mobile container and suppressing the migration banner.
frontend/src/components/AppUpdatingNotic: Modal‑style notice shown when the app detects a version mismatch and is refreshing.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders multiline assignment text with bolded step labels while preserving spacing.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: UI component managing audio recording, review, and upload workflow with error handling and share options.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with state-based labels and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Compact icon-only auth button supporting Internet Identity login/logout and handling edge cases.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Gate that auto-detects and redeems invitation codes, showing loading/error states and updating related queries.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Challenge chat interface supporting sending, editing, replying, and live-updating messages.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Alert dialog notifying the user when a challenge has been deleted with a dismiss option.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Displays a referenced message preview and author for chat reply chains, using cache or on-demand fetch.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer debugging panel showing auth state and allowing manual state refresh.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders informational popups for social contemplation and challenge details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Empty placeholder file for future language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Renders formatted popup sections with optional headings and pre-wrapped content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Gate component that blocks children until the user profile is fetched and a missing name is submitted through a form.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wrapper that displays loading and error states for a react-query query before rendering child content.
frontend/src/components/RecordingFeedbac: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/RecordingLevelMe: Displays a colored audio level meter based on a normalized 0–1 input level.
Audio player component that loads an audio URL, supports play/pause, seeking, and displays time.
frontend/src/components/RecordingWavefor: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Reusable dialog wrapper that standardizes popup structure, sizing, and scroll behavior using shadcn UI.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using a custom theme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Checks app version on startup and triggers a one‑time forced refresh if mismatched, with loop prevention.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Hook managing microphone recording, audio level analysis, timers, and producing a Blob/URL of the recording.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication status and principal string derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
Renders a placeholder screen with title, state info, optional edit button, and info popups using translations.
Main challenge interaction screen handling tabs, day selection, recordings, participants, upload state, and challenge data fetching.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Entry menu determining login or challenge actions based on auth and user status, with header controls and hero section.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Reads, writes, and clears app state parameters in the URL without reloading, preserving other query params.
frontend/src/utils/appVersion.ts: Retrieves and validates app version from meta tags or HTML, rejecting placeholders and malformed values.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed set of 7‑day challenge assignments with canonical IDs and detailed content.
frontend/src/utils/backendBuildInfo.ts: Caches backend build info in memory and exposes helpers to store, retrieve, identify, and clear it.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears the active challenge ID in sessionStorage for context persistence.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats challenge day headers using start time and day index to produce readable weekday/date strings.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Manages a sessionStorage flag indicating whether a challenge‑deleted notice should be shown.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Resets all client-side challenge state by clearing persisted IDs, URL state, and related React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/hardRefresh.ts: Performs a cache-busted hard refresh with loop protection and provides a way to clear the refresh flag.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase invitation codes using a restricted alphanumeric charset.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, stores, and clears challenge invitation URL parameters, including session-based persistence.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts between UI day values and backend day indices and validates both formats.
Logs sanitized recording upload attempts, failures, and successes with minimal diagnostic metadata.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Defines canonical assignment IDs and provides helpers for validating and normalizing recording identifiers.
Extracts and sanitizes backend error messages, mapping them to safe, user-friendly text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across normal and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/versionCheck.ts: Provides functions to compare the running app version with the latest HTML-fetched version and returns structured results; includes a deprecated wrapper for legacy refresh checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, existing features, and new feature requests related to challenge-scoped audio sharing and team visibility rules.
